author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat the oil in a deep pan for deep frying (CAUTION: Hot oil can be dangerous. Do not leave unattended). In a clean bowl, mix the flour and baking powder together with enough milk to form a pliable dough. Divide the mixture into 12 and shape into small balls. Press a blueberry into the middle of each one. Deep-fry for 1-2 minutes or until puffed up and crisp and golden. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on  kitchen paper. Toss in the sugar and cinnamon and serve warm.
ingredients: oil for deep frying,  200g/7¼oz self-raising flour,  2 tbsp baking powder,  50ml/1¾fl oz milk, or enough to bind,  12 blueberries,  50g/1¾oz caster sugar,  pinch cinnamon
